title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Addendum 9 – A Matter of Policing
description:
May 4, 2017 /  Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Justine Barron, as well as guest panelists Kwame Rose and Kondwani Fidel.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

Thank you to our awesome sponsors!
Quicken Loans - www.QuickenLoans.com/Undisclosed
Shari’s Berries – www.berries.com/UA 
ProFlowers – www.proflowers.com/UA   

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie #udaddendum
